audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Pretty wild party, huh?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Yeah, I guess

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Hey, Jimmy

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Oh, Hey!

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Hi Laura! So good to see you!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Hey, how've you been?

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Heya, alfie! What's cooking?

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Uh, not much? What's cooking with you, taylor?

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Oh, just the usual.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Hi Laura.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Oh, hey.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Whoa there. How we doing, alfie?

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: I'm... DRUNK! yeAH! verydrunknow

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Yeah, I can see that.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Careful there. You might want to sober up a bit.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Hey, the FONZ parties BETTER when he's had a FEW

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: WooooOOOOOO YEAH! LET's GET THIS PARTY GOING! yeah

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Okay, that's it, alfonso. I am taking your keys. You're too tight to drive.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Oh, MAN these White Russians are fkn GOOD. Pour me ANOTHER ONE!

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: alfonso is drunk tonight, guys!

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Huh. I never knew Kaitlyn owned a guitar. But there's one right there.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Yeah, weird

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Huh. I never knew Kaitlyn owned a guitar. But there's one right there.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Yeah, I've never heard her play before.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: I see you're at the buffet table straight away.

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Yeah, I'm starving. I forgot to bring my lunch to work, so I haven't eaten since breakfast.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Damn, you'd better get some food in you!

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Jimmy and the buffet table! Name a more iconic pairing!

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Gimme a break alfonso, I haven't eaten since 6am. I was dreaming about the food here the entire drive over.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Oh, I bet you dream about food every night!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: How's the pizza?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Hardly matters. I'm so hungry I could eat all four of these boxes right now. But yeah, it's pretty good.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Cool, maybe I'll grab a slice then.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Why are you going for the veggie platter? You know, sam, there's pizza right over there.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: I had carbs for lunch.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Don't want to wind up like Jimmy, huh? Well I can't fault ya for that.

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: This is a pretty good vegetable platter!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Pizza's great and all, but sometimes it's just too heavy. It's good they have a veggie option for you!

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: yup!

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Hey Jimmy! You wanna join me to check out this bar after? They make a killer White Russian!

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: We all know how you like White Russians. You downed like five of them at Steven's place last week.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Well I figure I'll keep up my streak.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Zoe told me you ditched her last night. What happened?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Well, she invited me out to the bar but my guild wanted to raid so...

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: You gotta get out there more Sam

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: But the new patch just dropped!

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: You dont have to hide in the corner all night Laura

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: I know, I just hate this loud music

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Come on, live a little!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Hah, thanks. But I'm good right here.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Come take your turn already, Sam!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Patience! I'm deciding my next move!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Whose turn is it?

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: It's mine, I'm still thinking.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Oh, okay.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Watch and learn, rookie. I'll show you how a master plays this game!

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: I wait with baited breath.

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Ugh did you hear, Alfonso? Sam bailed on me last night

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Aww Im sorry Zoe. Did he say why?

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: No, but I bet he's just playing more Runescape. He keeps talking about this thing called Varlamore?

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: I don't know, he makes it sound kinda fun

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: More fun than a night of drinks and salsa dancing? Impossible

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Wow... you've gotten so good at the guitar lately

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Hah, thanks Zoe,

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Yo Sam, the raids last night were so good!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: I know! But could you try to mute your mic when you eat next time Jimmy?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Oh, sorry, you could hear that?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Uhh yeah - it was the only thing I could hear sometimes!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Hey, sorry. I had to stop by the store on the way here.

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Hey what's up Sam! What'd you bring?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Some garden salsa sun chips and ton of goldfish

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Oh hell yeah I'm taking those home if they dont get finished

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Hey Laura! How's it going

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Oh hi Jimmy. It's good. Just enjoying the company

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Wanna come out to IHOP with us after? We're grabbing pancakes

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Sure. I just hope its quieter there than here

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Jimmy I heard you crashed Taylor's car. What happened?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Iguanas was closing and I kinda rushed over to grab a burrito on the way home. I took a turn too hard.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Dude! You're smarter than that

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: I know I know... I was just really craving some al pastor

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Why were you even driving his car in the first place?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Mine was in the shop and his keys were right by the door. It was unavoidable.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Christ.

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Yo Zoe, me and sam are going out to get tacos after. You wanna join us?

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Uh not if Sam's there. I'm still mad at him for ditching me last night to play a goddamn computer game!

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Cmon, really? You're avoiding him just for that?

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Yeah - he was gonna be my salsa partner! I had to dance with some random

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Hey whats up Laura! What game are you playing?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Hey Sam! Just some splendor. I've really been enjoying it lately. Want to join?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: I'll consider it.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: I just built a new gaming PC!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Oh, really? What specs?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Dude its amazing! Got a Ryzen 7, GeForce 5090, and 64 gigs of ram!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Sheeeeesh thats a beast! What have you played on it so far?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Stardew valley mostly. Might load up some old flash games too.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: So how's your super powerful gaming PC?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Oh, it's great! Super smooth performance on everything!

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: You built, it yourself, right?

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Yeah, picked out the parts, too. I had to order another stick of ram the other day. Took it from 32 gigs to 64.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Nice, nice

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Hey, Zoe.

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: I am so not talking to you.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Yeah haha, sorry Zoe. I just got caught up in some games with my clan

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: I can't believe. You ditched me for a fucking video game.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: The new patch just came out! We had to check out Varlamore. I'll catch you next time I promise

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Ugh, I'm so done with you.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: I heard you got fired Taylor. I'm sorry man...

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Thanks Sam. Yeah it sucks. Zoe lied about me stealing toilet paper of all things

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Toilet paper? Come on thats so petty. If you're gonna lie at least make it a good one

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Whats up Taylor, how you been? It's been a while

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Not great, man! First the car, then the toilet paper thing.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Yeah, I know what you mean. Chin up, though.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: I've been burying my sorrows in Minecraft. Maybe I'll build a monument to my late car. A proper memorial.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Heh, okay.

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Laura! Come on girl! Get up! Join me on the dance floor!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Uhh... I'm okay over here. But thanks for the offer Zoe

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Awww. Please? I promise its fun. I can teach you some moves!

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: I don't know, it's a bit loud tonight. I'd rather play some board games.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Hey Zoe, wanna join us for some games? Me and Sam were gonna play Splendor

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: With Sam? Hell no. That kid ditched me last night to sit at home on his computer

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Just ignore him if he bothers you that much. It'll be fun!

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Sorry Laura, I just can't with him right now

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Taylor! Come over here! We were about to start a game and we got a seat open

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Oooo what are you playing tonight Laura?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Brass Lancashire. It's been too long since we played!

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Wait, isnt that the one that takes like 3 hours to finish?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Only if you're slow

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Hey Laura. Mind if I join you in the corner? Feeling kinda overwhelmed tonight

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Come on over Taylor. There's plenty of room over here. It's nice and quiet away from the music

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Yeah, the music is a little much. Why does it have to be so goddamn loud?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Tell me about it.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: If I wanted this, I would go to a club.

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Hey, Taylor!

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Fuck off.

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Okay, look, I'm sorry for crashing your car. I've said I'm sorry a hundred times.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Sorry didn't get my car out of that ditch, Jimmy. Nor does it pay for two thousand dollars in repairs.

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: I'll pay you back, I swear! I'm just a bit strapped for cash right now.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Uh huh.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Yo Jimmy I heard you crashed Taylor's car! What happened?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Yeah... I was in a rush to get to the buffet and took a corner too fast

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Is the food that important?

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Always Alfonso. Always.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Sorry to hear about your car Taylor. Maybe a White Russian will cheer you up.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Thanks man, I could use booze right now. You know, I just had that car detailed too.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: What can you expect? Its Jimmy we're talking about here?

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Now I gotta deal with insurance, ugh.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Zoe! What the hell!

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: I'm sorry!!! I'm so so so sorry Taylor! I didn't think they would actually take me seriously

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: I work at a very serious company. They take everything seriously

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: It was just a joke...

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: So, I just got fired.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: No Way! What happened, Taylor?

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Zoe spread some rumor that I was stealing toilet paper from the bathroom

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: You said they had 3 ply, right? I wouldn't blame you

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Hah! Shut up, man!

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: Did you hear? Taylor got fired for stealing toilet paper

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Uhhh... what? Stop lying Zoe. That's crazy

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: No for real! His job stocks 3 ply in the bathroom. Its so soft...

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Oh shit they got 3 ply? I might need to steal some myself.

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: So, you having fun?

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Yeah, it's good. Much better without KAITLYN here.

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: For sure. that bitch is the WORST

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: I mean, unforgiveable.

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: For real!

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Kinda weird here without kaitlyn.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Is that a complaint?

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: No, not really. The bitch had it coming.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: Definitely. And the last thing I want to be doing at this party is talking about kaitlyn.

audio.speaker: alfonso
audio.text: Heh, sorry I brought it up!

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: It's a really fun party we have here. Not that KAITLYN gets to enjoy it!

audio.speaker: jimmy
audio.text: Why even speak her name? She's dead to me.

audio.speaker: zoe
audio.text: You're right. Forget her!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Do you really think it's a good idea throwing a party in Kaitlyn's house?

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: What? Are you worried she's gonna find out? Oh no! She might give US the silent treatment.

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: I'm just saying. She could come home any minute.

audio.speaker: taylor
audio.text: I hope she does. I'd love to see the look on her face. Conniving bitch.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: You know the worst part about this party? The whole thing smells like KAITLYN!

audio.speaker: sam
audio.text: Well that's what happens when you throw a secret party at Kaitlyn's house.

audio.speaker: laura
audio.text: Hey, we gotta get one last blowout before we NEVER TALK TO HER AGAIN!
